app_descript:
TimeTree: Shared Calendar

Brief

TimeTree is an efficient and user-friendly calendar app, designed to streamline the process of scheduling and sharing events among friends, family, or colleagues. With the ability to view monthly, weekly, or list displays, TimeTree presents a comprehensive overview of upcoming commitments and makes planning more collaborative and stress-free.
